H0.text: what role did george lucas play in star wars. Producer

H1.text: what role did george lucas play in star wars. Screenwriter

H2.text: what role did george lucas play in star wars. Editor

H3.text: what role did george lucas play in star wars. Film Director

A4.text: Lucas acted as executive producer for the next two Star Wars films, commissioning Irvin Kershner to direct The Empire Strikes Back and Richard Marquand to direct Return of the Jedi.

A5.text: while receiving a story credit on the former and sharing a screenwriting credit with Lawrence Kasdan on the latter.

A6.text: The Fox deal gave Lucas $150,000 to write and direct the film.

A7.text: Lucas wrote four different screenplays for Star Wars.
